import React from'react';const ALLOWED_TYPES=['image/jpeg','image/jpg','image/png'];const MAX_FILE_SIZE=5*1024*1024;// 5MB
const FileTypeValidator=_ref=>{let{file,onError}=_ref;React.useEffect(()=>{if(file){if(!ALLOWED_TYPES.includes(file.type)){onError('Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, JPG, or PNG)');return;}if(file.size>MAX_FILE_SIZE){onError('File size should be less than 5MB');return;}}},[file,onError]);return null;};export default FileTypeValidator;
